author: AntumDeluge
long_description:
### Description:

Allows tool & equipment wear to be disabled. Supports tools (pick, axe, shovel, etc.), weapons, & armor.

Armor mods supported:

- [![3d_armor](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=3d_armor&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.luanti.org/packages/stu/3d_armor/)

### Licensing:

- Code: [MIT](https://codeberg.org/AntumLuanti/mod-equip_wear/src/tree/master/LICENSE.txt)
- Icon: [CC0](https://openclipart.org/detail/169233)

### Usage:

##### Settings:

```
tool_wear
- Enables/Disables wear for tools such as picks, axes, shovels, etc.
- type:    bool
- default: true

weapon_wear
- Enables/Disables wear for weapons.
- type:    bool
- default: true

armor_wear
- Enables/Disables wear for armor.
- type:    bool
- default: true
```
